name: Lights On (Vieira Games)
description:
Lights On is a puzzle game where the houses ran out of power. You must fix this by plugging in the cables to turn the power back on in the homes before the time goes off.  There are three levels of hardship: easy, normal and hard. On easy mode, you have three tips and 2x time. On normal mode, you have two tips and 1.5x time. And on hard mode, you have only one tip and no extra time. 

I hope you enjoy this game,

Vieira Games.
